decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawing title numbers and documents: QDL02-MAA-00-XX-DG-A-0001 Rev P03, QDL02-MAA-00-XX-DG-002 Rev P03, QDL02-MAA-00-XX-DG-0003 Rev P03, QDL02-MAA-01-XX-DG-0001 Rev P03, QDL02-MAA-02-XX-DG-0001 Rev P05, QDL02- MAA-02-XX-DG-0002 Rev P04, QDL02-MAA-02-XX-DG-0003 Rev P04, QDL02-MAA-04-XX-DG-A-0002 Rev P04 (Block A Elevations), QDL02-MAA-05-XX-DG-A-0001 Rev P02, QDL02-MAA-05-XX-DG-A-0002 Rev P02, QDL02-MAA-06-XX-DG-A-2001 Rev P04, QDL02-MAA-06-XX-DG-A-2002 Rev P04, QDL02-MAA-70-ZxXX-DG-A- 4001 Rev P01, QDL02-MAA-70-ZxXX-DG-A- 4002 Rev P01, QDL02-MAA-10-XX-DG-A-2001 Rev P03, QDL02-MAA-06-XX-DG-2002 Rev P03, QDL02-MAA-03-XX-DG-A-0001 P08 (Ground floor GA plan), QDL02-MAA-03-XX-DG-A-0002 P06 (First floor GA plan), QDL02-MAA-03-XX-DG-A-0003 P06 (Second floor GA plan), QDL02-MAA-03-XX-DG-A-0004 P07 (Third floor GA plan), QDL02-MAA-03-XX-DG-A-0005 P05 (Roof Plan), QDL02-MAA-04-XX-DG-A-0001 P05 (Proposed Site Elevations), QDL02-MAA-04-XX-DG-A-0003 P05 (Proposed Elevations Block B), Revised Landscape Plan Rev P-03, Planning Statement by Turley (June 2022), Design and Access Statement by WAA Architects (June 2022), Archaeological Desk Based Assessment by Headland Archaeology (September 2021), Indicative Surface Water Drainage Strategy by RSK (September 2021), Phase 1 Site Appraisal by GRM Development Solutions (February 2020), Energy Statement by Dynamic Energy Assessors (September 2021), Ecological Survey by AAe Environmental Limited (October 2021), Highway Statement by RSK (July 2021), Financial Viability Statement by Turley (September 2021), Design and Access Statement Addendum Overshadowing Analysis by WAA Architects (October 2022), Ecology Appraisal by AAE Environmental Consultants (October 2021), Highway Statement by RSK (24 October 2022).
description: Application for non-material amendment to planning permission Ref: 223459FUL dated 20.12.2022 for 'Redevelopment of site to provide nine four storey townhouses; associated landscaping, car and cycle parking, and refuse storage (following demolition of the existing workshops)'. Amendments seeks minor changes to window positions, removal of entrance door recesses and internal arrangement amendments to Block B
